backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining suit stats, module toggles, hazard structures, and subsystem state management with default initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files in the HUD application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring PWA meta tags, icons, manifest link, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest providing PWA metadata including icons, display mode, colors, and app details.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and fetch handlers for caching and offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with boot sequence, display mode handling, tab routing, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Central audio bus managing SFX and voice playback with autoplay-safe unlocking and layered sound support.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: Provides HEV-style voice playback helpers gated by a voice-enabled setting.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: Defines UI sound effect helpers that play interface sounds when voice is enabled.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: Implements an ambience audio player with playlist control, volume, looping, and custom track upload.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Renders a multi-stage boot sequence with CRT effects, typed text, progress, and audio cues.
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Displays hazard levels with icons and status classes for multiple environmental hazard types.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudGlobalEff: Shows global HUD visual effects like bloom, critical overlay, and presence glow respecting motion settings.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: Wraps the HUD layout with scaling, orientation handling, global effects, CRT overlays, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Shows an overlay indicating the HUD system is offline with a warning message.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Displays a compact HUD with key stats and a control to restore the full HUD with sound and voice feedback.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Provides reusable HUD panel components including stat panels, meters, and vitals aggregation.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Layout wrapper for the tactical HUD, showing top/bottom bars, side panels, reticle, and stat panels using suit store data.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Pure visual overlay component rendering reticles, corner frames, and tactical readouts.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Interactive command console with input history, command execution, scrolling, and system log integration.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Reusable confirmation modal triggering UI sound effects and invoking confirm/cancel callbacks.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Displays suit subsystem statuses and toggles with confirmation flows, log entries, and audio/voice feedback.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Scrollable display of formatted system log entries with timestamps and type labels.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Renders a medical diagram image with colorâ€‘coded body part overlays based on health and armor values.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Shows computed medical stats such as vitals, trauma data, and hazard-derived values using suit and hazard stores.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: Canvas-based radar component with animated sweep, rings, crosshairs, and deterministic contacts rendered with pulsing markers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoUiScale.ts: Computes a responsive UI scale based on viewport width with configurable min/max values and resize handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useHudPresence.ts: Tracks pointer and touch activity to update CSS variables for HUD interaction effects using rAF throttling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for authentication via Internet Identity, managing login state, identity loading, and client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for stats and module state queries plus mutations for updating stats and toggling modules.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference via matchMedia and returns a boolean flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: Determines if the device is in landscape orientation using matchMedia with resize and orientation listeners.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive HUD theming, color variables, and visual overlays like CRT, scanlines, and bloom.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Implements a text command parser that updates suit, hazard, and UI state and logs actions.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Provides a set of monochrome Unicode glyphs for hazards, indicators, and directional icons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Zustand store managing audio playback, playlist control, volume, and custom track loading.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Monitors hazard levels to trigger critical flashing and throttled voice alerts.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Zustand store tracking per-hazard levels with setters, aggregation, status evaluation, and reset.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Stores HUD and info settings like color scheme, display mode, voice, and UI scale.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Zustand store for suit stats and modules with setters, toggles, and reset.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Maintains a log of system events with timestamped entries and a clear function.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Simple UI state store managing landscape mode toggling.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Stores selected weapon, ammo type, and fire rate with setters and reset.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: Renders core suit statistics, hazards, and vitals using various HUD panels.
frontend/src/tabs/HazardsTab.tsx: UI tab showing hazard levels, trends, environmental stats, and filtering options using hazard store data.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: Displays subsystem readouts, system logs, and a command console panel.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: Renders the medical readouts component inside the tab.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides UI for configuring HUD, voice, display, and system settings with logging and restart handling.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Shows tactical radar, status readouts, and a contact list within HUD panels.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: Manages toggles for suit modules and includes an ambience audio player.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: Displays weapon information with collapsible details using weapon system store data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, borders, radius, and enabling plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, existing mobile/PWA-related features, and pending requests for default display mode, installable PWA, and mobile UI improvements.
